thread.title: Airwheel M3 Complete Motorized Skateboard, a Consummate Tool to be Hyun-cool
thread.title_full: Airwheel M3 Complete Motorized Skateboard, a Consummate Tool to be Hyun-cool

title: Airwheel M3 Complete Motorized Skateboard, a Consummate Tool to be Hyun-cool
text: Airwheel M3 Complete Motorized Skateboard, a Consummate Tool to be Hyun-cool Recently, Volkswagen has been bothered by its emissions scandal. It is reported that the Volkswagen has installed emissions software in diesel vehicles. usa, 23 October 2015 -- Recently, Volkswagen has been bothered by its emissions scandal. It is reported that the Volkswagen has installed emissions software in diesel vehicles. The software allowed a vehicle to recognize whether it was being driven on the road or running in a test laboratory, and turn engine emissions controls on or off. And this emission cheat has broken the trust of our customers which affects half a million cars in the US. On contrast, Airwheel Technology makes great efforts to develop new products, Hyun-cool and Environmental friendly. Airwheel M3 electric skateboard is such a vehicle which cannot be ignored. For the aspect of being Hyun-cool, Airwheel M3 has remote control with infinitely variable speeds With the 2.4 G wireless remote control, it can realize infinitely variable speeds and the effective distance reaches 10 meters. Wireless remote control skateboard M3 can be modified and realize personal "transformation". You can experience more possibilities and travel freely which give you a full display of your invention with the changeable maple board. Moreover, it can be decorated into any color and any picture. On the other hand, Airwheel M3 maple electric skateboard is totally an Environmental friendly tool. The original Japan-Made Sony Lithium Battery Inside features 1,800 recharge times, 3.8 times life expectancy and 2.9 times duration of ordinary lithium batteries. Just ride along without worrying about battery burning or explosion, 81.4Wh / 163Wh at your option. Since electrical energy can be regarded as a clean and inexhaustible energy. Especially, quite recently man has succeeded in converting sunlight directly into electrical energy.Different from Volkswagen, Airwheel Technology puts most emphasis on quality and commit itself to make white clouds swam in the blue sky. With increasing number of people riding Airwheel electric scooter, then the result has been more blue - sky days than smoggy ones. # # #
